name: LUNAR VENGEANCE v0.1 - Infinite Runner
description:
My first Unity project after learning for a month.  This is a very early testing stage of the project. Lunar Vengeance is an infinite-runner game, where you play as the "Lunar Owl" (aka fake boomkin via WoW). As the owl, you are running through forests trying to find an answer to your question - who is destroying the habitat!?

Currently game has only one game mode and it is Infinite, but in the future I plan on adding Storyline mode, "Fly" mode, "Driving" mode and a totally different approach on player vs enemy.

Since this is a very early build, expect bugs, flying objects, missing collisions, and possibly more. Please let me know of them in the comments, as well as your thoughts about the gameplay <3
